troubleshooting.title: Performance Issues when Using with Remote Desktop

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: When trying to run in a Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) environment, the performance is slow and choppy.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: Running a standalone version of over a slow RDP connection may result in performance issues.

steps-informal.p: As a workaround, you try to run as an Eclipse plugin when working with a slow RDP connection.
